Weather Alert/Monday hours
==========================

Due to inclement weather conditions, the city office will be closed Monday and will open Tuesday at 10am. Be safe and stay warm.

[Read more](https://cotullatx.civicpluswebopen.com/media/3476 "(opens in a new window)")

Thank You

Toggle Menu

Elections
=========

[![votetexas.gov](https://www.cityofcotulla.org/sites/g/files/vyhlif14491/files/styles/full_node_primary/public/media/elections/image/1431/logo_votetexas_edited.jpg.webp?itok=r4RxjqWD)](https://votetexas.gov "(opens in a new window)")

**Texas Election Code §87.121(g), (h), (i)\***  
For an election, information on the roster for a person who votes an early voting ballot in person or by mail shall be made available on the publicly accessible city Internet website by 11 a.m. on the day following the day the early voting clerk: (i) enters the roster listing for a person voting in person, or (ii) receives a ballot voted by mail.

La Salle County - [https://www.co.la-salle.tx.us/](https://www.co.la-salle.tx.us/ "(opens in a new window)")

Texas Ethics Commission - [https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/forms/coh/CTA\_ins.php](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/forms/coh/CTA_ins.php "(opens in a new window)")

Texas Secretary Of State - [https://www.sos.state.tx.us/index.shtml](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/index.shtml "(opens in a new window)")

LaSalle County Elections Office - [https://co.la-salle.tx.us/index.php/offices/election-board](https://co.la-salle.tx.us/index.php/offices/election-board "(opens in a new window)")
